thread.title: Jimi Hendrix family suing Tucson shop owner for guitar
thread.title_full: Jimi Hendrix family suing Tucson shop owner for guitar

title: Jimi Hendrix family suing Tucson shop owner for guitar
text:
> Washington Jimi Hendrix family suing Tucson shop owner for guitar FILE - In this 1970 file photo, Jimi Hendrix performs on the Isle of Wight in England. Hendrix's estate is suing a Tucson, Ariz., man for a guitar once owned by the legendary guitarist, the Arizona Daily Star reported, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015.
